KSP has been crashing a lot on me recently. Without mods, fine, but with mods, crash. This happened recently, no major changes done. A bit ago, KSP still worked with a lot of mods, but after a while, it started crashing constantly. Does anyone have any tips on trouble shooting this issue?
 don't talk to me if you're going to say "no logs, no support"

I assme you are on Steam.

You probably have auto updates enabled, and KSP updated to 1.3.1 last week.

Downgrade to 1.3.0 and you will be fine

Edited October 8, 2017 by linuxgurugamer

Crashing in-game or crashing when loading? 
Ingame crashes can be caused by memory shortage (mostly RAM), or by running the game in 32bit. Running your game in 64bit will result in much smoother gameplay/loading. 
If the game crashes a lot during loadup, you have some mods that are outdated or don't work well together. 

I hate to be this person, but if those tips aren't helping, logs are quite efficient (or more clarificationof the  situation). And we'll be glad to help in detail.  
 Your OP is now the same as calling a car garage and saying, " yeah, my car got stuck, the moter crashes, I just want to know what it going on there, but won't drive by so you can check it out.

hmm alright so reverting to 1.3 helped but my save files will be stuck at the loading screen

 

log coming Soon™

I can't see anything specific but there are two things that strike me as odd:

1. Don't use mods that were made for 1.3.1 if you downgrade to 1.3.

2. You only have 4GB of RAM.

Alright, so I started using my backup GameData, and all is fine. For now.

Either I need to upgrade back to 1.3.1 and wait for all my mods to update, or find a way to downgrade mods back to 1.3.0 with CKAN.
